title: Justin Bieber vs Beethoven -Epic Rap Battles of History #6
description: Download on iTunes ► http://erb.fm/buyBeethoven Click to Tweet this Video: http://clicktotweet.com/Srbe4 ► ERB Returns on May 5th, 2014 at http://youtube.com/erb ◄ New ERB merch: http://bit.ly/MNwYxq Subscribe to Alex Farnham!! (Justin Bieber) http://www.youtube.com/damitsgood808 Hi. My name is Nice Peter, and this is an Epic Rap Battle of History. I couldn't make these without you, and without the help of many wonderful and talented people. http://instagram.com/erb | http://facebook.com/erb http://twitter.com/ERBofHistory | http://google.com/+ERB http://erb.tumblr.com | http://soundcloud.com/erb http://epicrapbattlesofhistory.com ▼ CAST ▼ Justin Bieber: Alex Farnham http://www.youtube.com/damitsgood808 Ludwig Van Beethoven: NicePeter http://www.youtube.com/NicePetertoo http://twitter.com/NicePeter | http://instagram.com/nicepeter Bach: EpicLLOYD http://www.youtube.com/EpicLLOYD https://twitter.com/theEpicLloyd | http://instagram.com/theepiclloyd ▼ CREW ▼ Executive Producers: Peter Shukoff & Lloyd Ahlquist Special thanks to Ceciley Jenkins and her incredible makeup skills: http://www.youtube.com/ceciley Production Coordinator: Aaron Zaragoza PA: Amy Brown Audio Engineer: Dante Cimadamore Awesome old broken piano provided by: Collins Piano Service, Santa Monica, CA http://www.CollinsPianoService.com Custom Beat Produced by Taylor Lipari http://www.youtube.com/user/taylorlipari tweet him say hi: http://twitter.com/ttaylorr I hang out here: http://www.youtube.com/nicepeterToo http://www.facebook.com/nicepeter http://www.twitter.com/nicepeter This rap was recorded using a Shure Sm7 microphone, Logic, and Protools. see you soon, -nice peter
